title: Guests: Kim Soper, Karen Lee Carter, Dawn Ronningen, and Carole Carter join Pat for a chat!
description:
Kim Soper of Leland Ave Studio creates modern quilts and builds connections. She passionate about connecting quilters to each other. Via her interviews in her Creativity series and her online projects.
-------
Karen Lee Carter lives an artful life full of trims and beads, buttons and yarns, all displayed on amazing quilts. She is a teacher and a self proclaimed ‘embellisher’.
------
Dawn Cook Ronningen is a author, collector, historian and quilt maker. She specializes in vintage and antiques quilts. A woman after my own heart!
-------
Carole Carter is the quiltmaker behind From My Carolina Home website. She hosts lots of fun events, which is how I came to know her! If you love scraps and all things quilting, you are in the right place. She is a lot of fun!
================
Visit American Patchwork & Quilting at www.allpeoplequilt.com.
Visit host Pat Sloan at www.patsloan.com.
